title: Players dcing but u lose LP for it...
body:
so to my understanding league of legends is a team game to some point.. but if someone dc's in a ranked match the whole team get punished I don't see this to be fair considering it has nothing to do you so why do u lose LP for it?? it doesn't make sense cause u just spent how ever long finding that game to have someone dc maybe half way through cause their mum kicked them off or some shit.... I understand that yes the other team should get LP but the team that happens to get the 12 year old kid that dc's after 3 mins to troll his team shouldn't lose their LP or mmr they didn't do anything wrong. I get that people could just leave last second safing their mate some LP its just something that will have to  be looked into by mr riot employees.
{{champion:427}}

replies.body: Too easy to take advantage of. Too hard to prove that a player just didn't turn their internet off...
